# CustomMaterial.LightingModel.lit

**Case**

The entity renders using physically based rendering techniques without a clearcoat.

## Declaration

```swift
case lit
```

## Discussion

A custom material using the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/LightingModel-swift.enum/lit] lighting model uses physically based rendering techniques, but doesn’t render a clearcoat. If a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/LightingModel-swift.enum/lit] material’s surface shader calls `params.surface().set_clearcoat()` or `params.surface().set_clearcoat_roughness(),` ReallityKit ignores it.

## Specifying the lighting model

- **CustomMaterial.LightingModel.clearcoat**: The entity renders using physically based rendering techniques with a clearcoat.
- **CustomMaterial.LightingModel.unlit**: The entity renders with no light or shadow calculations.
